page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS.
page.content: The work for this section of the Domesday Project was done as a voluntary activity by pupils after the completion of external and internal examinations. The main contributors were Andrew Miller, Janet Green, Clare Johnson,Marisa Farrugia,Mandy Dossett,Rachel Fitzgerald,Sarah Parry, Helen Manning and Michelle Sutton from the Fifth form; Dawn Caley, Julie Form, William Benn, Lisa Sanderson, Mark Beaton, and David Baker from the Sixth form. We are grateful to all those who gave information. The data was fed into the computer by members of the computer department, for which we are grateful. We are also grateful to Hillcroft School, Stowmarket for the research which they carried out for this project.
